method.name: Genetic Algorithm for Fuzzy K-Nearest Neighbors classifier

reference.ref: X. Hu and C. Xie, Improving fuzzy k-nn by using genetic algorithm, Journal of Computational Information Systems, vol. 1, no. 2, pp. 203-213, 2005.

generalDescription.howWork: GAFuzzyKNN is a wrapper-based FuzzyKNN classifier. It works by estimating the best possible values for the parameters M and kInit through using a binary genetic algorithm, and the accuracy obtained with a FuzzyKNN classifier as the fitness function.

parameterSpec.param: K value: K parameter in the k-NN rule.
Population Size: Size of the population of the genetic algorithm.
Maximum generations: Maximum number of generations in the genetic algorithm.
Crossover probability: Probability of applying crossover in the genetic algorithm.
Mutation probability: Probability of applying mutation in the genetic algorithm.

method.example:
Problem type: Classification Method: GAFuzzyKNN-C Dataset: appendicitis Test Show results: Vis-Clas-Check Parameters: Default settings
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see into the Vis-Clas-Check results' file the classification results for the test set:
TEST RESULTS ============ Classifier= appendicitis Fold 0 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 1 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 2 : CORRECT=0.8181818181818181 N/C=0.0 Fold 3 : CORRECT=0.9090909090909091 N/C=0.0 Fold 4 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Fold 5 : CORRECT=0.7272727272727273 N/C=0.0 Fold 6 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 7 : CORRECT=0.9 N/C=0.0 Fold 8 : CORRECT=0.8 N/C=0.0 Fold 9 : CORRECT=1.0 N/C=0.0 Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.1218181818181818 stddev Global Classification Error + N/C: 0.08284207818105106 Correctly classified: 0.8781818181818182 Global N/C: 0.0
